--mbx-modal-x-color-light.description: Modal x icon color when [dark mode](https://cianciarusocataldo.github.io/mobrix-ui/docs/shared/props/#dark)  is `off`

--mbx-modal-x-color-dark.description: Modal x icon color when [dark mode](https://cianciarusocataldo.github.io/mobrix-ui/docs/shared/props/#dark)  is `on`

--mbx-modal-x-color-hover-light.description: Modal x icon color when [dark mode](https://cianciarusocataldo.github.io/mobrix-ui/docs/shared/props/#dark)  is `off`, on [hover](https://cianciarusocataldo.github.io/mobrix-ui/docs/shared/props/#hover)

--mbx-modal-x-color-hover-dark.description: Modal x icon color when [dark mode](https://cianciarusocataldo.github.io/mobrix-ui/docs/shared/props/#dark)  is `on`, on [hover](https://cianciarusocataldo.github.io/mobrix-ui/docs/shared/props/#hover)
